name: Brickz! (VARIETY Pack) ZX Spectrum Next
description:
Brickz! is a 'Breakout' style game created as a companion to my game dev workflow video on YouTube. The VARIETY pack features a total of 25 levels featuring samples taken from the "INVADERZ", "GEOMETRICA" and "CASTLE ASSAULT" level packs.

Features include Exploding bricks that instantly detonate all remaining bricks on the screen when hit, Bombs that can be activated using the space bar or joystick button to destroy all remaining bricks as well as Power bricks that increase the bonus points level awarded.

Written in un-optimized Sinclair BASIC to be played on the ZX Spectrum Next (& compatibles) or CSpect emulator.
